channel.title: C++ Convoluted?
channel.description: I had a professor in college who told me not to convoluted my C++ and C code. Is it okay to use C header extensions in C++ code?

item.title: C++ Convoluted?
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:320424”]Um, what? “not to convoluted”?

I assume what he was getting at was that if you’re using C++, you should be using C++ constructs and library wherever possible, only falling back on c-style code if necessary. Too many people write C++ as if it were C.[/quote]

that is bad but they prolly realized c is superior and are trying to become full-fledged c coders!!!

Read full topic
